meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dawn Hart Mike Nelson Carl Bradshaw Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6101.

td.p: Dawn Hart, a bookkeeper from Laughlintown, Pennsylvania
Mike Nelson, a mechanical engineer from Geneva, Illinois
Carl Bradshaw, a financial manager from St. Louis, Missouri (whose 2-day cash winnings total $17,899)

tr.td: FRENCH ART & ARTISTS
ACTING SEQUELITIS
THE IVY LEAGUE
ASTRONOMY
QUOTED IN BARTLETT'S
IT'S ALL "GOOD"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Jean Duvet was "the master of" this one-horned creature because of his series of engravings featuring it')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

[The time\'s-up signal sounds.]
(Mike: [*]?)
(Alex: Ooh, sorry. Dawn?)
(Dawn: What is [*]?)
(Alex: You missed it by a fraction of a second there, Mike.)

The Hitchhiker\'s Guide to the Galaxy

MikeDawn
')
